requestBody.title: Configure default hours and availability mode API Trace

data.instruction: Simulate this persona scenario and validate outcome deterministically: "Staff works at multiple locations". Capture traces and snapshots so coverage can be audited later.
data.expectedResult: Scenario behavior is either confirmed as supported or produces a clear, actionable failure report.

data.title: Configure default hours and availability mode API Trace

data.instruction: Using concrete API reads and persisted state checks, validate this requirement is satisfied: "Fast historical trend querying without heavy cross-domain joins". If not satisfied, record exact gap and failing entities/endpoints.
data.expectedResult: Evidence either confirms requirement coverage or captures a precise, reproducible gap.

data.instruction: Query and compare availability + bookings timeline for the entities involved in this scenario.
data.expectedResult: Calendar state reflects booked slots, blocks, and any conflict outcomes from previous steps.

data.instruction: Create a primary location for the biz and set timezone aligned with scenario context.
data.expectedResult: Location exists and is associated with the new biz.

data.instruction: Create a booking order using the published offer version with realistic times and monetary totals.
data.expectedResult: Booking order is created and linked to offer/offer version with coherent totals.

requestBody.title: Owner reviews consolidated calendar state Snapshot

blocks.title: What user sees at a glance

data.instruction: Create customer account/session and verify customer can browse published offers.
data.expectedResult: Customer session established and offer discovery succeeds.

data.instruction: As biz member, list bookings and progress one booking through operational status updates.
data.expectedResult: Authorized role can update status while preserving auditability and lifecycle consistency.

error.message: You are not a member of this biz.
